snippet: A video released by the group shows the aid worker kneeling in a desert landscape that looks identical to where two American journalists were killed by the group in the past month. Moments later, he is beheaded.
abstract: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria releases video of beheading of British aid worker David Cawthorne Haines, third such execution of a foreign hostage; video offers clear message to Britain, vital ally of the United States as it builds international coalition to target the militant group.

byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA
byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi reported from New York, and Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura from London.

lead_paragraph: A video released by the group shows the aid worker kneeling in a desert landscape that looks identical to where two American journalists were killed by the group in the past month. Moments later, he is beheaded.

headline.main: ISIS Video Shows Execution of David Cawthorne Haines, British Aid Worker
headline.print_headline: ISIS Video Shows British Hostage Being Beheaded

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
